Text:
Absolutely AMAZING! Thanks a gazillion for this! :)

For when you upload the second pack, could you by any chance include a reading order for the crossovers and miniseries? (as in chronological in regard to the actual series).

I would if I had any clue whatsoever! Honestly the "chronology" text file included here came from GHawk's torrent ... I fixed it slightly but it's woefully out-of-date.

If anybody out there has a good reading order for this series, post a link.
by the way, on the titles of this post and the torrent file i managed to screw up the year. the darkness was introduced in 1996, not 1994.
